description:
After recalling his childhood dream, Hayate gets a day off work and takes a walk around the city.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bokura wa Mukashi, Uchuu no Keiji ni Wakasa to wa Furimukanai Koto Da to Osowatta
We Were Once Taught by the Space Police That Youth is to Not Look Back
僕らは昔, 宇宙の刑事に若さとは振り向かない事だと教わった
